questions.question: How many tornadoes happened in Canada in 2017?
On average, how much decline in volume has the Canadian Arctic sea ice experienced per decade since 1968?
answers: A little, but nothing to be concerned about.
questions.description: The chart shows the downward trend in sea ice from 1968. To lose 7.4% of volume per decade is a substantial amount and has devastating effects to the environment.
